name: SCM Shoot'em DEMO
description:
Hai, I'm so excited to announce my first game... SCM SHOOT'EM. This game sorta in twin stick shooter genre where you're a spaceship and your objective is to survive wave after wave until the end. This game just a DEMO, so your feedback is highly appreciated. The full game will be release sometimes in winter 2018 (hopefully.. finger cross).

Features

Item drops

Boost (be careful, because it's drained your health)

Controls

W - Forward

Cursor - Rotate

Left Click - Shoot

Right Click - Boost

Soo...  enjoy my game.
